Class UdpConn

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ua.it.atnog.wsgw.UdpConn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Conn

    public class UdpConn
extends Object
implements Conn, AutoCloseable
    UdpConn class.

    Helper class used to interact with udp entities. Provides methods to send data through udp connections.

        public UdpConn(BlockingQueue<Task> queue,
               SocketAddress address,
               DatagramSocket socket)
        UdpConn constructor. Constructs a udp connection with a specific BlockingQueue.
        Parameters:
        queue - BlockingQueue used to receive tasks.
        address - SocketAddress address and port of the entity.
        socket - DatagramSocket server socket used for communication.
